T02D1266:24a-1: tri kra ma au ba de sha n'a ma /
T02D1266:24a-3: man ngag rim pa gsum pa zhes bya ba /
T02D1266:24a-4: dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1266:24a-5: rnam 'byor bas thog mar rlung ma dang /
T02D1266:24a-6: gnyid ma rtse sprad la tsandal'i shin tu drag la yun thung bar spar te /
T02D1266:24a-7: des de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
T02D1266:24a-8: spyan la sogs pa'i rtog pa bsreg go //
T02D1266:24a-9: de ltar yang nas yang du bsregs pa dang /
T02D1266:24a-10: sbar bas phyi'i dngos po gang la dmigs shing bltas
T02D1266:24a-11: kyang 'phar zhing 'dar ba byung na sngags kyi rim
T02D1266:24a-12: pa mthar phyin pa yin te /
T02D1266:24a-14: bde ba chen po phab la nor bu'i dkyil du
T02D1266:24a-15: srog gi rlung bzung la sems rtse gcig tu shin
T02D1266:24a-16: tu bsgrims la yang dang yang du gtad do //
T02D1266:24a-17: de ltar gtad pa dang nor bu 'gas pa snyam byed cing mi bzod na /
T02D1266:24a-18: rdo rje'i rked par sems bde ba la yang dang yang du gtad /
T02D1266:24a-19: de ltar gtad pa dang bde bas mi bzod pa dang /
T02D1266:24a-20: rtsa bar bde ba la sems gtad /
T02D1266:24a-23: lte bar bde ba la sems gtad /
T02D1266:24a-24: de ltar gtad pa de yang mi bzod na de
T02D1266:24a-25: nas gyen du bzhi cha gcig gi gnas su sems
T02D1266:24a-26: gtad / de ltar sems gtad pa dang yang mi
T02D1266:24a-27: bzod na yang gyen du bzhi cha gcig gi nang
T02D1266:24a-28: du bde ba la sems gtad /
T02D1266:24a-29: de ltar gtad pa dang yang mi bzod na yang
T02D1266:24b-0: bzhi cha gcig gi gnas su bde ba la @24b
T02D1266:24b-1: sems gtad / de ltar gtad pa dang /
T02D1266:24b-2: yang bde ba mi bzod na snying gar bde ba la sems gtad /
T02D1266:24b-3: de ltar gtad pa na bde bas mi bzod cing snying 'dar zhing sprugs pa snyam byed na /
T02D1266:24b-4: yang gyen du bzhi cha gcig gi gnas su bde ba la sems gtad /
T02D1266:24b-5: de ltar gtad pa dang yang bde bas mi bzod
T02D1266:24b-6: na yang gyen du bzhi cha gcig gi gnas su
T02D1266:24b-8: de ltar gtad pa dang bde bas yang mi bzod
T02D1266:24b-9: na bzhi cha gcig gi gnas su bde ba la
T02D1266:24b-10: sems gtad / de ltar gtad pa dang yang mi
T02D1266:24b-11: bzod na yang gyen du bzhi cha gcig tu bde
T02D1266:24b-14: yang bde ba la mi bzod na /
T02D1266:24b-15: lkog mar bde ba la sems gtad /
T02D1266:24b-17: bde ba mi bzod ming yang gyen du bzhi cha gcig gi gnas su bde pa la sems gtad /
T02D1266:24b-19: mi bzod pa snyam byed na yang gyen du bzhi
T02D1266:24b-20: cha gcig gi gnas su bde ba la sems gtad
T02D1266:24b-21: / de ltar yang gtad pa dang mi bzod pa snyam byed na /
T02D1266:24b-22: skad 'gags pa snyam byed cing smra mi shes pa
T02D1266:24b-23: snyam byed pa na yang gyen du bzhi cha gcig
T02D1266:24b-24: gi gnas su bde ba la sems gtad /
T02D1266:24b-26: yang mi bzod pa snyam byed na yang gyen du
T02D1266:24b-27: bzhi cha gcig gi gnas su bde ba la sems
T02D1266:24b-28: gtad / de ltar gtad pa dang /
T02D1266:24b-29: yang mi bzod pa snyam byed na smin mtshams phrag tu bde ba la sems gtad /
T02D1266:24b-32: dngos po gang la dmigs shing bltas kyang smyos pa
T02D1266:24b-33: snyam byed na ye shes rim pa mthar phyin pa
T02D1266:24b-34: yin te / 'phro bcad pa la gsang ba'i rim pa la bya'o //
T02D1266:24b-35: der yang sna sgor dbugs bsdams /
T02D1266:24b-36: nang gi sems dang sems las byung bar chos thams
T02D1266:24b-37: cad 'dus pas phyi rol gyi yul la mi rtog
T02D1266:24b-38: par / nang gi sems kyi rtog pa'i byung tshor ci byung ba la mi dmigs par bsgom mo //
T02D1266:24b-39: de ltar bsgoms pa dang lus ras bal gyi 'dab
T02D1266:24b-40: ma bzhin du yang zhing smig rgyu lta bu la
T02D1266:24b-41: sogs pa rtags lnga mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur
T02D1266:24b-42: ba dang / gsang ba'i rim pa mthar phyin pa yin te /
T02D1266:25a-0: de bas na nang gi sems dang phyi'i yul @25a * //
T02D1266:25a-1: thams cad dbyer mi phyed cing gnyis su med par mi dmigs par bsgom mo //
T02D1266:25a-3: mngon par shes pa lnga rim gyis skyes na bde ba chen po thob bo //
T02D1266:25a-4: ro smad bshal zhing mi theg pa snyam byed cing /
T02D1266:25a-5: 'grong gi phyag tu zung cing na na thur du
T02D1266:25a-6: sel ba'i rlung zin pas shin tu rgyas pa yin
T02D1266:25a-7: te / de zhi bar bya ba'i phyir smin phyag tu bde pa la sems gtad do //
T02D1266:25a-12: rna ba na zhing 'ur 'ur zer na gyen du
T02D1266:25a-13: rgyu ba'i rlung zin pas shin tu rgyas pa yin
T02D1266:25a-14: te / de zhi bar bya ba'i phyir lte bar bde ba la sems gtad /
T02D1266:25a-16: de ltar sems gtad pa dang /
T02D1266:25a-17: lte bar zug cing spos pa snyam byed na //
T02D1266:25a-18: me dang mnyam du gnas pa'i rlung zin pas rgyas pa yin te /
T02D1266:25a-19: de zhi bar bya ba'i phyir mgrin par bde ba la sems gtad /
T02D1266:25a-20: kha mchu spring cing skad 'gags pa snyam byed na /
T02D1266:25a-21: lce'i dbang po la gnas pa'i rlung zin pas shin tu rgyas pa yin te /
T02D1266:25a-22: de zhi bar bya ba'i phyir snying gar bde ba la sems gtad /
T02D1266:25a-23: de ltar gtad pa dang snying gcu zhing sprugs pa snyam byed na /
T02D1266:25a-24: rlung la gnas pa'i rlung zin pas rgyas pa yin /
T02D1266:25a-25: de zhi bar bya ba'i phyir nor bu'i dkyil du bde ba la sems gtad /
T02D1266:25a-26: de ltar gtad pa dang lus kyi tshigs thams cad
T02D1266:25a-27: na zhing spring ba snyam byed cing lus thams cad
T02D1266:25a-29: khyab byed kyi rlung zin pas rgyas pa yin te /
T02D1266:25a-30: de zhi bar bya ba'i phyir bde ba la rang bzhin med par bsgom mo //
T02D1266:25a-32: dgod snying 'dod cing ku co'i sgra 'don snying 'dod
T02D1266:25a-33: na shin tu rgyas pa bde ba la rgyas pa
T02D1266:25a-34: yin te / shin tu yang bsgrims la bde ba la mi dmigs par bsgom mo //
T02D1266:25a-35: de ltar bsgoms pa dang shin tu myos shing dran pa med cing rmongs na /
T02D1266:25a-36: zhi gnas shas che ba yin te /
T02D1266:25a-37: de med par bya pa'i phyir nang gi chos thams cad sgyur mar bsgom mo //
T02D1266:25a-38: de ltar bsgoms pa dang sems rgod cing 'phro na sgyu ma mi dmigs par bsgom /
T02D1266:25a-39: de ltar cha snyoms nas yang dang yang du bsgoms
T02D1266:25a-40: pas gsal ba rtog pa med pa skyes nas bde
T02D1266:25a-41: ba chen po thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D1266:25b-0: gong ma de ltar bsgom @25b pa'i tshe mkha' 'gro
T02D1266:25b-1: ma nyams sad pa'i phyir 'od pa'i tshe brda bya'o
T02D1266:25b-2: // de ma shes na rtog pa med par bsgom mo //
T02D1266:25b-4: mkha' 'gro mas byin gyis brlab par 'gyur ro //
T02D1266:25b-5: 'gro kun gsang sngags don ldan zhing //
T02D1266:25b-6: che 'di nyid la byang chub thob par shog / man ngag rim pa gsum pa zhes bya ba /
